ElementType.Name: ProcedureObjectForDownload
ElementType.Caption: Procedure for exporting and downloding CSV file

Attribute.Name: ExportProcedureObjectName
Attribute.Description: This is name of procedure object for export.

Attribute.Name: ExportFileSeparator
Attribute.Description: This is separator of exported file.

Attribute.Name: ExportFileExtension
Attribute.Description: This is extension of exported file.

Attribute.Name: ExportFileEncoding
Attribute.Description: This is Encoding of exported file.

Attribute.Name: HTTPResponseHeaderContentType
Attribute.Description: This is Content-Type at respoonse header to downlod.

Attribute.Name: StartCode
Attribute.Description: Bigining code at the procedure

Attribute.Name: WhereCode
Attribute.Description: Inserted code to For each command

Attribute.Name: EndCode
Attribute.Description: The code at the termination of procedure

Attribute.Name: SubCode
Attribute.Description: The code at final section

Attribute.Name: delimiter
Attribute.Description: delimiter of string

Attribute.Name: ReplaceSeparatorValue
Attribute.Description: if this value is 'true',the procedure replace string separator value to alternative value.

Attribute.Name: MenuObjectName
Attribute.Description: This is name of menu calling the procedure object.

Attribute.Name: ExportProcedureObjectName
Attribute.Description: This is name of procedure object for export.

Attribute.Name: ExportFileSeparator
Attribute.Description: This is separator of exported file.

Attribute.Name: ExportFileEncoding
Attribute.Description: This is Encoding of exported file.

Attribute.Name: ReadINIfile
Attribute.Description: When this property is true, the procedure will read ini-file.

Attribute.Name: INIFilePath
Attribute.Description: INI-file path

Attribute.Name: INIFileName
Attribute.Description: INI-file name

Attribute.Name: ExportedFilepath
Attribute.Description: Exported File path

Attribute.Name: ExportedFilename
Attribute.Description: Exported File name

Attribute.Name: StartCode
Attribute.Description: Bigining code at the procedure

Attribute.Name: WhereCode
Attribute.Description: Inserted code to For each command

Attribute.Name: EndCode
Attribute.Description: The code at the termination of procedure

Attribute.Name: SubCode
Attribute.Description: The code at final section

Attribute.Name: delimiter
Attribute.Description: delimiter of string

Attribute.Name: ReplaceSeparatorValue
Attribute.Description: if this value is 'true',the procedure replace string separator value to alternative value.
